page.title: 06MILL (cont) & NEAR LEYS FARM
page.content: ..prediction.Increased volume of sales result from magazine advertising,sales of all attractive patterns and fashion shows.There is a friendly atmosphere in the mill which provides a good canteen for both shift and day workers .A building extension is being planned with more machines and more jobs in mind. { NEAR LEYS FARM} Mr.Wearmouths dairy farm has 60 cows & 4 calves.Two of which were born the night before our visit,Friesian & Aberdeen Angus are the breeds used. Calving is at an average age of 2\-3 years is usually between June & November.In Winter the cows are in the shippon where they are fed with the baled hay from the barn supplemented with rolled barley,dairy nuts & bran. The milk tanker calls daily to empty the dairy tank which holds............
